=== Setup Additional Hardware ===
If you have any hardware in this machine that isn't installed by default, you should set it up now.

A few examples of additional hardware to setup are:
* Tuner Card Drivers/Firmware
* External Set Top Box Changers
** Firewire
** Serial
** IR

'''''* Proprietary ATI and NVidia video drivers should be installed and configured after MythTV installation and configuration is complete.'''''
